name: QTestin
tag_list: mobile, monitoring, apm, applications, web-app, native, hybrid, performance, availability
overview:
QTestin APM is a SaaS online service, offering real time performance monitoring for mobile applications, content and services.

By measuring performance and availability across real devices, live networks & geographies, QTestin enables developers and operators to gain an “outside-in” understanding of the end-user perspective and quickly detect, diagnose and solve performance issues.

QTestin supports mobile web, HTML5, native and hybrid Apps and monitors across real devices connected to live mobile networks in major cities and regions.

Key Features: • User friendly online platform, no installation or code implementation are required. • Instant results including geographical dashboards, response times, availability, failure rates, logs and CDN evaluation. • Custom performance reports with comparative competition analysis. • Ongoing monitoring to view performance trends over time. • Customized notifications & alerts for performance threshold violations.
